summary: It's time for change in America--but not without a few parting words from former President George W Bush. Here's your chance to discover the man behind the myth as HBO presents Will Ferrell... See full summary »
cast: Will Ferrell|Michael Delaney|Pia Glenn|Adam Mucci|Patrick Ferrell|John Ashcroft|Gordon Brown|Phoebe Cates|Elaine Chao|Dick Cheney|Common|Stephen Harper|Kevin Kline|Angela Merkel|Edward Norton|Gale Norton|Richard Perle|Colin Powell|José Luis Rodríguez Zapatero|Karl Rove|Nicolas Sarkozy|Tommy Thompson|Venus Williams
title: You're Welcome America: A Final Night With George W. Bush
